section.title: Description
section.p: "Used to provide billing information, on the ordered service, to the filling application." - HL7 Version 2.8, BLG Segment.

stentry.p: "Identifies the account to be billed." - HL7 Version 2.8, BLG-3.

"Identifies someone or something other than the patient to be billed for this service." - HL7 Version 2.8, BLG-2. Possible values include (from HL7 Table 122): Charge; Contract; Credit; Department; Grant; No Charge; Professional; Research.

"Explains the choice of and provides the clinical rationale for the selected charge type in [chargeCategory]" - HL7 Version 2.8, BLG-4. Possible values include (from HL7 Table 475): Allergy; Intolerance; Treatment Failure; Patient Request; No Exception.

"Specifies when to charge for the ordered service." - HL7 Version 2.8, BLG-1. Possible values include (from HL7 Table 100): On discharge; On receipt of order; At time service is completed; At time service is started; At a designated date/time.
